itunes:title: 268 - Feeling Like Junk? 4 Ways How To Get Inspired Now
itunes:author: Alex Sugg, Andy J. Pizza, Yoni Wolf
itunes:summary:
You know that feeling you get when you've been looking at your phone too much? You've refreshed twitter, instagram and Facebook 7 times each and there's NO NEW CONTENT.

I don't know about you, but I end up feeling a little like the Very Hungry Caterpillar after consuming tons of JUNK FOOD.

In today's episode we are going to dive deep into how only consuming creative junk food inspiration, like a heavy diet of social content, can make your creative work suffer.

Tune in for 4 ideas for finding healthy vibrant creative inspiration, rich in creative nutrients and vitamins! PLUS one silly but effective tactic that will prompt unexpected ideas in your next creation!

This episode is Part 1 of our 3 Part CREATIVE PEPamorphosis Series! We are taking 3 weeks to do a REMOTE RETREAT, using social distancing as a metaphorical cocoon for creative development!

Share Your Inspiration on instagram by using hashtag #cptremoteretreat
